meanings.sent1: The caoutchouc was bouncy and stretchy.
meanings.sent2: I used caoutchouc to fix the hole in my shoe.
meanings.sent3: The caoutchouc ball bounced higher than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her resilience was like caoutchouc, always bouncing back from setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The caoutchouc material was so flexible, it could be twisted and turned in any direction.

meanings.definition: A substance obtained from the latex of certain tropical plants, used in making various products.
meanings.sent1: The caoutchouc from the rubber tree was used to make tires.
meanings.sent2: The company imported caoutchouc to manufacture gloves.
meanings.sent3: The caoutchouc sap was sticky and hard to remove from clothes.
meanings.sent4: His creativity was like caoutchouc, molding ideas into innovative products.
meanings.sent5: The caoutchouc material was essential for crafting durable items in the workshop.
